Mike Douglas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Douglas 0 Michael Delaney Dowd Jr. (August 11, 1920 – August 11, 2006), known as Mike Douglas, was an American "Big Band" era singer, entertainer, television talk show host (The Mike Douglas Show), and actor. Michael_Delaney_Dowd_Jr. ( August_11_,_1920 – August_11_,_2006 ) , known as Mike_Douglas , was an_American_"_Big_Band_"_era_singer , entertainer , television_talk_show_host ( The_Mike_Douglas_Show ) , and actor .
